docs.snippet: Alternative broadcasts of N.C.A.A. tournament games feature hometown announcers with a brash but entertaining subjectivity....

docs.abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column on NCAA Final Four teamcasts; holds that former Kentucky star Rex Chapman's brash subjectivity kept viewers engaged and made the game more entertaining.

headline.main: With a Holler, Homers Make N.C.A.A. Broadcasts Fun

docs.snippet: The nation's largest doctors' group said Monday it won't try to block Medicare's release of billing records for 880,000 physicians, although it continues to oppose the government's recent decision to open up the massive data trove....
docs.lead_paragraph: The nation's largest doctors' group said Monday it won't try to block Medicare's release of billing records for 880,000 physicians, although it continues to oppose the government's recent decision to open up the massive data trove.

headline.main: Medical Assn Won't Stop Medicare Doc Data Release

docs.snippet: Norwich didn't fire Chris Hughton because he's black. The English soccer club fired him because it is petrified of dropping out of the Premier League and losing millions in revenue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Norwich didn't fire Chris Hughton because he's black. The English soccer club fired him because it is petrified of dropping out of the Premier League and losing millions in revenue.

headline.main: English Soccer Is Now Without a Black Coach
